website_summaries.verdict: A quality necklace for a low price. However, the chain length won't work for everyone.
pros: Looks sleek, not cheap or flimsy
Made of gold-tone plated stainless steel
cons: Not for ladies who prefer longer chains, as this one is 16 inches with a 2-inch extender
May take a few weeks to arrive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's the perfect size! It isn't big but ya big enough to be noticed and can be paired with other neckalaces. I have worn it almost every day since it came in the mail weeks ago and it hasn't turned yet nor has my neck become irritated(I have sensitive skin).
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece I have had mine for 2 years and it still hasn't changed color yet.....
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great necklace! I bought this for my 14 year old daughter for Christmas 2 months ago. She wanted her name in a name plate with real gold but I wasn’t sure if she was ready for such an expensive piece of jewelry since she is still in middle school. So I purchased this and she hasn’t lost it (she’s ready for real gold, lol). It still looks great!! It hasn’t tarnished or faded in the least bit yet. Very impressed with this piece considering it’s only plated.. Highly recommend this seller and the jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Bri...

customer_reviews.title: A Birthday Gift Success
customer_reviews.text: This personalized necklace is nicely made and because it's stainless there's no plating to wear off and no issue with skin reactions (metal allergies run in my family). The necklace even shipped in a gift box that by pure coincidence coordinated to the unfinished jewelry box I painted for my niece's 7th birthday (also ordered on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: NewsView

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is very cute. I like it. My name is a bit smaller than I expected but I’m happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christy G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for Price
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a 10 year old girl for a gift and she LOVED it! She put it on immediately after getting it. It's well made, too. Thinking about buying myself one, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Holds up well! No tarnish/green after wear
customer_reviews.text: absolutely beautiful! I haven’t taken it off since I received it in the mail! Shipping is slow but as expected with a customized piece. Came earlier than estimated which was a pleasant surprise! Does not tarnish, even if in the water, I forget to take it off during showers at times and it’s still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: KSporre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The princess text looks smaller than expected, I thought the text would be bigger, but it's still cute ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality , Cute & Cheap ! Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this necklace for my daughter and myself and we absolutely love it. The necklace came neatly secure inside a cute little box with a jewelry cleaning cloth. My daughter even took a shower with hers on and i see no signs of tarnishing. I also emailed the seller about my shipping concerns and with no hesitations , not even 24 hours I received an email back from the seller with information about my package. I highly recommend ordering with this company the price is cheap , their quality of their product is GREAT & CUTE and lastly their customer service skills is wonderful. The wait was worth it. We LOVE ITTTTT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Neely Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece, will break.
customer_reviews.text: After two months of waiting, the product was unveiled to be gorgeous and my girlfriend loved it. However after 2 weeks of daily wear, the clasp broke rendering the product useless and ultimately embarrassing me for having gotten a cheap present. The seller refused to offer any assistance, as the time it took for the necklace to arrive was considered part of the countdown for the warranty, per them. I've reordered a custom necklace from a legitimate jeweler.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. So DISAPPOINTED :( save your money
customer_reviews.text: The name was really cute- I got gold gotchic/English lettering with my name- so in style and chic but unfortunately when it arrived the chain was very cheap and brass looking did NOT match the name at all. I’ve never worn it because it is so ugly. I tried contacting the seller NUMEROUS times and after weeks of trying they finally responded by saying they would not let me send it in or refund me. They didn’t even ask what my problem was with the product. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Best necklace ever
customer_reviews.text: Got this in 2018 and since I’ve bought this and I still haven’t taken it off. No rust (yes I shower with it) it’s perfection, I’ve Sent this link to over 20 people. @allnaturalg_ is my insta if you want an up to date photo.
customer_reviews.author: All Natural G

customer_reviews.title: Illiteracy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty name plate for someone named Samantha LOL! My name is Melanie, self-explanatory review.
customer_reviews.author: Brujanegra

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was looking for a name plate and I came across this company. Today we received the Name Necklace and she loved it. It was nicely sized and the looked very well made. Came in a giftable box with a small wipe. She was very impressed. Thank you. Just remember when you order that it may take from two to three weeks. Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kittendorf

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Necklace!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this necklace as a birthday gift for my friend. She absolutely loved it, she scared me because she said "That's not how you spell my name", i could see by her face and the way her eyes were shinning that she was really happy with this gift. It is a well made product and looks very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Christian G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice necklace
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they liked it. I didn't get any updates about it, so I don't know how well it held up. As for the look of the necklace, it was nice but you can tell it's not expensive looking. I would buy one for me, but they don't have my name.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazing for this price! We're not expecting that it will last for years, but it fills the bill for a tween right now. This is a very cute piece with very nicely shaped letters. It made a very well appreciated gift, and I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a low cost piece of personalized costume jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful necklace, awesome price!!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is so cute! I got it for my daughter who has been wanting one for a long time and I'm so glad I did! It looks so good on her and it is great quality. Definitely a great buy for the money, I am thinking about getting one for myself. I am going to be buying these for Christmas presents!! If you are on the fence, get it!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Javon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a quality gift ! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I really love my necklaces they arrived today in a cute little gift box individual ly wrapped with a little cleaning cloth. Beautiful quality, I "WILL" be ordering more of these as gifts they are perfect for that! The metal does not irritate my neck at all because I wore them both together all evening and the night was warm. No strange smell from the metal either. I'm so excited to order more. Hope they hold up for a long time. Did not take long to receive them since I have not got Prime I worried that it would take forever. I believe it took about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have a hook to hold!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our daughter who loves jewelry. But... I’m very disappointed that the neckless didn’t have a hook to connect so she can wear it properly. I ended up trying to tie a knot on the back which only makes the name look lopsided in the front. It won’t stay on very well and eventually falls off, lucky we find it every time. As for the necklaces it self, it’s very cute and the letters are well cut. If you’re gifting this neckless I’d recommend you open it completely before.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Cute necklace!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my only complaint is i think i prefer it another 2-4 inches longer. But it still a great necklace! I'm used to longer necklaces, about 22-24" long.. but i decided to try out this necklace that is i think an 18", so a big difference & I'm definitely not used to it yet, but I'd buy it again & recommend it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE AMAZING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW THIS TURNED OUT AWESOME!!!! I COULDN'T BE MORE HAPPY!!!! I WAS SO EXCITED TO GET THIS AND I GOT MY NAME WITH AN ARROW & IT DIDN'T DISAPPOINT!!!! IT'S SIMPLY PERFECT!!!!! AND IT ARRIVED SOONER THAN EXPECTED!!! IT'S SOOO PRETTY!!!!!!! GREAT JOB!!!!!!! AND IT CAME WITH A CLEANING CLOTH!!!! BIG SMILE HERE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love Urban

customer_reviews.title: So cute for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I got name necklace for my flower girls and they love them!! Great quality for such an affordable price! The chain is a little weak but I still give it five stars. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is so beautiful! It totally exceeded my expectations. It's not a puny charm at all. I love that there are options on the chain for various lengths. It looks WAY more expensive than it was; the value is incredible! I looked on etsy for a custom made, but the wait time was too long. I needed instant gratification! Lol!! This necklace arrived in 2 days and I couldn't be happier. I will probably purchase several more for gifts, if still available. If the message on this charm speaks to you, I highly recommend purchasing this necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good value - doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and the name is nice and thick. Not flimsy feeling. Will update this review with use.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking out loud..

customer_reviews.title: it hasn't chipped or become dull, it doesn't pull my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second necklace. My boyfriend's cat broke my first one when she pounced off of my neck from being scared (I was so mad). I do occasionally sleep and shower with it on and haven't had any problems with it at all. It doesn't turn my skin green, it hasn't chipped or become dull, it doesn't pull my hair. It's good quality and simple; a pretty necklace that I can wear with anything and I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: LittleBob

customer_reviews.title: Personalized chain
customer_reviews.text: This was my little girls..birthday gift! To celebrate her big 10! (March 2020). It's well crafted, appropriate size, nice shine (gold),readable lettering, neat chain link. She was Very SURPRISED,she really likes it. I recommend this chain#thanks#VirginIslands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rachel style necklace
customer_reviews.text: Just received my necklace and I'm in love with it 😍😍😍. Ordered on Jun 24 and recieved it July 15. Product quality is A+. Great price well worth the wait. Better than the necklaces advertised and sold on instagram businesses.
customer_reviews.author: KQ

customer_reviews.title: Is worth the price 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these Nameplates necklace !! Well to say I am very pleased I did one for my daughter and my sons girl friend,, I would had gave it a 5⭐️ But it’s a little to yellow but safely to say my sons gf wears it every day and showers with and it hasn’t tarnished👍🏻👍🏻 I would def recommend to anyone thank you nicely done...
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this necklace for 2 weeks straight--since it arrived in the mail--because I love it so much and it hasn't turned. It looks new, great quality. I want more!!!
customer_reviews.author: OV15

customer_reviews.title: Good value & quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, looks more expensive than $10. The name is bigger than expected but not overly large. I like that the connections on the sides of the name are fixed and don’t slide (see pic). What I don’t like about the closure is the ring you hook the clasp to isn’t very big (see pic). I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorMade

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter for Christmas. Although it arrived after Christmas, it was worth the wait. It is absolutely beautiful and our daughter loves it. In fact she says it is her favorite gift she received this year. It looks very nice on her and hangs in just the right spot on her neck. It is nicely made and came very well packaged. I would highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reactions 😊 cute for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute necklace no doubt, but since you're paying under 20$ it almost resembles that. Def cute enough to sport with a casual cute outfit and pull off the costume jewelry look though! I bought one for my bestie bc she liked mine😊
customer_reviews.author: Adelle ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the extended wait. I was nervous it was going to be too big or “too much” since I’d added the crown above the top corner, but was very pleased upon its arrival! I could not stop smiling, it’s my pups name and it’s perfect 👌🏽Only this is I’m a little worried I may lose the pendant if the chain breaks without me noticing, as it doesn’t seem too sturdy and as well made as the font itself. You can’t just loop a different chain through it either. I’ll figure something out but for the price and pendant alone, definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is amazing for the price! I've had mine for a while now and it hasn't oxidized, and the metal in the name plate isn't heavy or bulky but it also isn't flimsy or so thin that I have to worry about it bending. I wear this almost every day and love it; highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to a family member as a gift and she loved it. Will be ordering again but this time ...
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is delicate yet it is quite bold.I received it in a timely manner which is always a plus. I gave it to a family member as a gift and she loved it. Will be ordering again but this time for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Angee

customer_reviews.title: Here's a trick to make it last!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I got the Spanish word for "love" necklace and I love it. The charm its self almost looks like real gold. I definitely wanted it to last so sprayed it with a thin coat of clear spray paint so that it doesn't loose it's color or turn my neck green. It took perfectly and still looks the same. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Shae Lovell 💓

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. Love that you can personalize the name, font, and metal type. My daughters name has uncommon spelling, so this was a great surprise when she seen that she had a beautiful necklace with her name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 necklaces. Description says "personalize" however I was never given that option and all 3 came with "Hannah" which I thought was just the name of the font. They were promptly returned.
customer_reviews.author: TCS96

customer_reviews.title: The name itself looks nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: The name itself looks nice and well made. The chain not so much. Too thin and flimsy. I had to tighten the loops upon receiving it. My daughter likes it and only wears it occasionally as she is afraid of the chain breaking.
customer_reviews.author: WRX

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and comes in a beautiful gift box with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and comes in a beautiful gift box with jewelry storage bag as well. EXCELLENT buy for the price especially!
customer_reviews.author: MariaM

customer_reviews.title: Good price, beautiful necklace
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! Great price & I ordered way ahead of time to ensure I’d get before Christmas. Got one for each of my daughters as it is impossible to ever find personalized anything for their names. Can’t wait to see their surprise when they open their gifts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blandov

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad.....Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, quality is good however shipping too foreverness.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love my Ryan necklace! Great quality for price. Have showered with it on and it doesn't fade or leave color on my skin. I rarely take it off. It said it wouldn't arrive until August/ September but I recieved it the last week of June. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Order it!!
customer_reviews.text: I looooovvveeee this!!! The shipping threw me off. Ordered and received in like 3weeks, but expected date was like August (so just order it lol) I’m going to order 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great look and does not turn colors!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high hopes for this necklace based on the price point. I expected that it would turn colors quick. I have been pleasantly surprised! My 15 year old daughter loves this and gets many compliments. It still looks great and she has showered in it and wears it to dance practice. I would definitely recommend buying this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Strom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and turnaround!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a customized necklace on April 10th and received it on April 27. My original delivery date was June 18th to July 2nd. I love this necklace and will be ordering all of the women in my family one for Christmas. I want another or 2 for myself.
customer_reviews.author: shireco

customer_reviews.title: So Blessed
customer_reviews.text: So cute, this is my second time purchasing. I get so many compliments on this necklace. Love it, one of my fave pieces of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: KenadaDiva

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my customized necklace!! It arrived way earlier than I had expected!! That literally made my day!! I had placed my order in on March 27th and the expected delivery time would be May 22 - June 18. I received a surprising email on April 11th, that I would receive it on Monday April 13th. Sure enough, I checked my mail and there it was!!! My name necklace is big enough to read. (I’ve compared it to a quarter)
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about ordering these necklaces because I wanted several and it wasn't clear how to order three. But, there was no reason for my hesitation. Company was very responsive and I got exactly what I wanted. Very easy process. The necklaces look great and the people I got them for absolutely loved them. I bought them for a friend and her daughters, but these would be a super fun shower or BFF gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loveee it, I thought it wouldn't be able to get it wet because it would fade but I haven't taken it off since I got it, I shower and everything and it's STILL looks like it did when it came out the packaging. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tay Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this necklace!!! I have 2, the first 1 was purchased 2yrs ago 😍🥰 same price 💰🤩 a great gift for last min to look like you put 💭 into it😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good message, well made and perfect gift to a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we thought it was when we bought it, good message, well made and perfect gift to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Geritol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase from them. Both necklaces came and I beautiful! I’ve had them for over 2 months now and they haven’t tarnished!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 years old daughter love this necklace. It's dainty but super cute. Shipping was extremely quick. I'll update the review if it doesn't hold up.:
customer_reviews.author: DBold

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really like this necklace! Simple and sweet. Easy to style and wear. Check out my Instagram for more pics of this item and other Amazon finds I am loving!!! kimberly_Misfits_Fashion
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly- Misfits Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Love this necklace!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this necklace. I’ve been wearing it for months and have not taken it off whatsoever. It has not rusted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I GOT THEM 2!
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THEM FOR MY LIL GRANDDAUGHTERS FOR CHRISTMAS. SO CUTE AND THE OLDER 1 LOVED IT THE 4 YR. OLD.. NO BIG DEAL. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Dazi

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The necklace looks beautiful. Its a gift for my mother in law so I haven't worn it to see if it turns the skin green or not. The box it came in was falling apart and flimsy also weirdly striped with red and white so didnt really scream elegance or giftable so I did put it in another box. Overall it looks really nice and I think my MIL will like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for unique names
customer_reviews.text: When you have a unique name you can’t ever find it in stores. Bought this as a graduation gift. Came faster than expected date. Well made, didn’t seem cheap as if it was going to fall apart after a single use.
customer_reviews.author: Ducken

customer_reviews.title: Sterling silver, sturdy chain, lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this little necklace! Sterling silver, sturdy chain, lots of compliments! Must get it in gold too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: and it looks really good. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is sooo cute. It doesn't irritate my skin at all, and it looks really good. I would definitely recommend. It would make an AMAZING gift for someone or for yourself. I have to get a silver one soon
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Keepsake
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture and my name is Kimberly. The gift box is perfect as well. I haven’t worn it yet but it’s a nice keep sake.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyJanae

customer_reviews.title: Love The Necklace
customer_reviews.text: Love the necklace, wish I order the next chain length bc the size I order was too exact! That is on me , but other then that great necklace...
customer_reviews.author: Bapierre

customer_reviews.title: Blessed
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It looks like more than what it cost. I've not taken it off since I got it. Shower and all. Never changed color on me. Still looks as shiny and great. I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This necklace was perfect. It’s just the person who I ordered it for had an h in their name “Nichole” and I didnt know until after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love my necklace wear it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color great length shower with it and has not turned color yet have had for about 2 months. I am trying to order another but cannot find how to customize
customer_reviews.author: Baldur Krahl

customer_reviews.title: Months of wear and it is still pristine!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this necklace months ago and I wear it every day! The metal on the name and chain have not changed color at all and it has not changed my skin color either! Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Space Kitten Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but....
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is cute but the chain is very cheap (you get what you pay for). I almost accidentally threw it away because it was packaged with other items and was in a tiny box. I missed it the first time and had to dig it out of the trash when I noticed it was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas and she loves it but wishes the chain had been shorter or at least had the option. She said its still her favorite gift
customer_reviews.author: chelsie

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this necklace. It broke as soon as I put it on. I didn't even get to take a picture wearing it :(
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Large Name? OK!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this necklace! It's the perfect size on and looks stunning. Even an 11 letter name can be accommodated, as I asked for my gamertag and it fits perfectly fine. :) It is well worth the wait it takes to ship it here and I would recommend this to anyone looking for a customized necklace that won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They turned out very pretty, and got here a lot sooner than the estimated shipping said they would.
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Taylor pendant
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice pendant necklace and the chain isn't too short at all ( I was worried about that) it's a good length ..yeah.. I pretty much love anything with my name on it :D
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice necklace....I thought it would turn colors but 3 months later and it still looks good. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good Until I Realized Something
customer_reviews.text: Good, recommended one of my friends to get this necklace but when she got it I realize her was more golden than mine , MIND YOU it didn’t change color since I received it. I received it in a gold-silver color. But it was decent
customer_reviews.author: Devonshae

customer_reviews.title: good cheep
customer_reviews.text: gave this to my girlfriend and she loved it instantly, she wears 2 other necklaces and next to them it looks dull but on its own it look great amazing for how cheep it is
customer_reviews.author: Liam Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: I’m amazed !! Great quality !!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this necklace for more than 2 years and I’ve never seen it change color!! I have bathed with it and went swimming !! Amazing ! My skin is very sensitive and will change the color of any jewelry but this is real !
customer_reviews.author: Apollonia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Fast shipping (got here over a month early. And the name plate is a bit thicker than others, which I really like!
customer_reviews.author: rayyys3

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a name necklace for a while, and this one is perfect. I'm not normally a fan of gold jewelry, and usually, fake gold looks SO fake. But this one is pretty good! I wear it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MGrant528

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE BUY, LOOKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Stainless Steel, Looks Like Real Silver! Great Weight and Overall Great Accessory! So Many People Leave Great Compliments When I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Najee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty necklace
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty costume jewelry necklace. I like it but I ordered the GOLD and I got the SILVER which is okay since I like silver just as well and don't feel like doing a return. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Grace G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Necklace!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone as a gift they absolutely loved it! Very good quality and seems as though it would last! Would definitely recommend buying as a gift for someone who seems to already have everything lol.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Good price. Daughter wears it every day. Only drawback was shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Came in but was very ugly, not what I expected. Wish they would’ve had something so I could know how the end product would turn out, never gonna wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to finally see my name on one of these!!! The product was great -- came on time and was a very good quality for the price. Item looked great and was exactly as described in the posting. The only issue I had with it was that the chain that it comes with is a little bit short and there is not a possibility to change the chain to a longer one because they are attached. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, it's a very nice gift, only problem I have is or should I say my wife has is the length of the chain (which she can buy an extension) and her neck had some discoloration after she sweated with the chain on
customer_reviews.author: Star Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worried but def worth it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her necklace.she thought it was soo cool to have her whole name. Purchased the rose gold....super cute!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful necklace
customer_reviews.text: I got my necklace! It is beautiful. I thought it would be flimsy because of the price but it is heavy. It was definitely worth the wait. I plan to purchase more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: samantha l

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love me necklace - has two lengths you can adjust it to -so if you want it longer/shorter you can adjust 💚😍
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Skowron

customer_reviews.title: I did not get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered the blessed necklace in gold and on my last order I specified the blessed necklace in silver and they sent another gold one. I wasn't to happy about that and especially since the gold is not that great. Oh well you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. W.

customer_reviews.title: No tarnish, no discoloration.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in silver and gold, I wore them daily switching out each color. They were my absolute favorite necklaces, a family friend stole them but I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexx Vierra

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't tarnished or turned my neck green. I've received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: naja_2_dxn

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient put it on right away. It looked well into constructed and not cheap or flimsy
customer_reviews.author: xoxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! I just got it recently the name part of the necklace has a little weight to it so for the price it is very good! The chain I would say be very careful it’s not weak but I wouldn’t recommending yanking on it too hard
customer_reviews.author: chasitymiller

customer_reviews.title: Very important
customer_reviews.text: I will need someone to answer my messages. I received necklace with wrong name. After the fact i ordered the necklace i received the neckale so i can create which name and was charged for it again different price. I need the corect order and now.
customer_reviews.author: natasa

customer_reviews.title: buy
customer_reviews.text: it is really shiny and good quality and will not fade. a little fragile if you sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: TScott

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected, to be honest. Purchased this because I’d always wanted one and my day to day necklace was in the jewelers being repaired. I do appreciate a larger clasp on this necklace, which makes It easier to fasten with acrylic nails.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love! It’s beautiful, classy, and the perfect size. It looks great on. My mom loved it so much when she saw me wearing it that she asked me to get her one as well. Just ordered one for her so she can feel blessed as well:)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Canton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice necklace. I am in love with it. Made well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MJ
